title: Campolargo 2010 Termão Red (Bairrada)
description: A ripe blend of Touriga Nacional and Castelão, the wine is balanced with considerable acidity from the Castelão and structure from the Touriga. It is only just beginning to mature while red berry and red currant fruit flavors still shine out. Drink now and until 2020.

title: Cantina Cortaccia 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
description: This refined white opens with delicate aromas of cut grass, chamomile flower and citrus. On the vibrant palate, firm acidity supports grapefruit and kiwi, while a mineral vein energizes the finish.

title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2014 Anger Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description: Aromas of Alpine wildflower and peach blossom unfold on this refined mountain white. The balanced palate offers Anjou pear, yellow apple, mineral, tangerine and white almond coupled with crisp acidity.

title: Cartlidge & Browne 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (North Coast)
description: While packed with ripe berry and cherry flavors, this wine is also well-balanced due to good acidity and firm tannins that buoy the full flavors and give a lively tension in the mouth. Complementary spicy accents from oak come out with each sip.

title: Château Coutet 2015 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
description: 88–90. Barrel Sample. With considerable acidity, the wine is bright and light in character. It has red currant-fruit flavors that are given structure by the fine tannins.

title: Château de Fonbel 2015 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
description: 88–90. Barrel Sample. Unusually there is a small amount of Carmenère in the blend, although here the yields are low. For the rest, Merlot dominates to give a lively, juicy wine with enough tannins as well as vibrant acidity.

title: Château Filhot 2015 Barrel Sample  (Sauternes)
description: 88–90. Barrel Sample. This wine is ripe and full of sugar that is just mitigated by the drier botrytis flavors. It is fresh, with a toffee aftertaste and a pleasant profile that's easy to enjoy now.

title: Caldaro 2014 Castel Giovanelli Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
description: Aromas of tomato vine, hay and passion fruit unfold in the glass. The crisp, linear palate offers white grapefruit, mango, a hint of oak-driven spice and mineral alongside bright acidity that leaves a clean finish.

title: Caldaro 2014 Söll Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description: Lovely scents of orchard fruit and apple blossom take center stage. The vibrant, savory palate offers crunchy rennet apple, tangerine and mineral while zesty acidity leads to the tangy finish.

title: Cálem 2000 Colheita Tawny  (Port)
description: Still with almost all its fruitiness intact, this is a red plum as well as sultana flavored. It's on the cusp between all fruit and older wood flavors, poised and balanced as a style of tawny that can be drunk either before or after a meal. Drink now.

title: Aderezo 2014  Ribera del Duero
description: Composed berry aromas meet expectations for Tinto Fino from Ribera del Duero. A stout, tannic palate is firm but not too hard or impermeable. Flavors of blackberry and cherry come with dry, woody accents, while peppery blackness rises up on a drawing finish.

title: Allimant-Laugner 2014 Praelatenberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
description: A rather subdued nose leads to a slightly aromatic palate which hints at russet apples and gently rounded ripeness. This is fresh and fruity and has a very refreshing core.

title: Borgo del Tiglio 2013 Selezione Chardonnay (Collio)
description: Aromas of toasted oak, vanilla and yellow apple skin emerge from the glass. The palate is linear and elegant, revealing subtle flavors of vanilla, citrus zest, mineral and walnut. Notes of butterscotch and mineral close the finish.

title: Moser 2014 Moscato Giallo (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
description: Intense scents of apricot and peach, not to mention a hint of rose, lead the nose and follow over to the bright palate along with orange zest and lime. Sharp acidity leaves a tangy finish.

title: Russiz Superiore 2014 Pinot Bianco (Collio)
description: Delicate, enticing aromas of yellow wildflower, apple and crushed rock waft out of the glass. The elegant palate offers peach, pear and a tangerine note alongside vibrant acidity that leaves a tangy finish.

title: Russiz Superiore 2014 Pinot Grigio (Collio)
description: Delicate scents of spring blossom and white peach float from the glass while the elegant, refreshing palate offers mature apple, white almond and orange zest. Energizing mineral and firm acidity drive the finish.

title: Renato Keber 2012 Zio Romi Friulano (Collio)
description: Aromas of ripe pear, pressed yellow flower and a toasted note waft out of the glass. The mature, elegant palate shows dried apricot, yellow apple skin, bitter almond and crushed rock. Fresh acidity provides balance. It's not loaded with fruit richness but has a mineral-driven appeal.

title: Riverbench 2014 Estate Grown Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
description: Very clean and tight aromas are a tad reluctant at first, but then apple skins, lemon rinds and buttery honeysuckle scents show on the nose. The sip burst with tingling energy, with flavors of green apple, yellow pear and then lots of tangy citrus, from kumquat to orange zest.

title: Terlato 2014 Pinot Grigio (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Aromas of beeswax, elder flower and white orchard fruit emerge in the glass. On the lively palate, zesty acidity energizes creamy white peach, green pear and citrus while a mineral note backs up the tangy finish.

title: Thomas Schmitt 2014 Private Collection Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
description: Crisp melon rind, apple and pear flavors lend a cool, refreshing vibe to this off-dry Riesling. Brisk and vibrantly structured, it's a thirst quenching quaffer for everyday enjoyment. Drink now.

title: Torre Rosazza 2014 Sauvignon (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Delicately fragrant, this Sauvignon opens with scents of chopped herb, elderflower, hay and citrus. On the crisp palate, a hint of vanilla underscores peach and grapefruit while a light mineral note backs up the finish.

title: Tortoise Creek 2014 Mission Grove Pinot Noir (California)
description: Fresh, vibrant fruit aromas, a lively, appetizing texture, and cherry and raspberry flavors make this wine a crowd-pleaser. It's medium bodied, well balanced and tasty.

title: Tramin 2014 Unterebner Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description: Fermented and aged in large French and Austrian casks, this single vineyard Pinot Grigio opens with aromas that recall oak, yellow apple and candied citrus peel. The round palate offers white peach, vanilla pear, apple and lemon drop alongside racy acidity.

title: WildStock 2014 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description: Crisp and juicy flavors of cranberries and raspberries cut through, riding a wave of sharp acidity. This wine is young and vivid, fruit-driven and relatively simple, but delicious nonetheless.

title: Mahoney 2014 Las Brisas Vineyard Vermentino (Carneros)
description: This is a 100% varietal wine, fermented and aged in stainless steel, from a prized vineyard better known for Pinot Noir. Asian pear, tangerine and lemon-lime combine atop a crisp, dry and mineral-driven palate, finishing with a refreshing bite of peach.

title: Primosic 2013 Gmajne Chardonnay (Collio)
description: Aromas of toast, vanilla and citrus zest lead the way and carry over to the bright palate along with Golden Delicious apple, lemon drop and mineral. Firm acidity offsets the fruit flavors while a walnut note closes the finish.

title: Quinta da Lapa 2012 Reserva Tinto Red (Tejo)
description: This blend of Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and concentrated. It is full of dark tannins as well as spicy fruit. Blackberry flavors are perfumed, ripe and shot through with dry, smoky wood tastes. It's still a firm wine that will need more time. Drink from late 2016.

title: Quinta da Lapa 2014 Reserva Branco White (Tejo)
description: Quinta da Lapa has plantings of the rare Tamarez grapes that have gone into the blend of this wine along with Arinto. It is perfumed, ripe and fruity with a touch of spice and citrus and yellow fruit flavors. Drink now.

title: Quinta de Sant'Ana 2013 Q de Sant'Ana Pinot Noir (Lisboa)
description: While there is little varietal character in this Pinot Noir, it is still an attractive, light and fruity wine. Red berries come through strongly sustaining acidity and some tight, mineral tannins. The wine is already well developed and ready to drink.

title: Peter Jakob Kühn 2013 Quarzit Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
description: Fresh green herb and dusty mineral tones contrast ripe, luscious apple and pear flavors in this dry Riesling. Crisp lime and lemon notes lend a nervy, cutting feel to the midpalate. Drink now through 2020.
